item.title: Alarm is misfiring very load, 6th September
item.description:
The Trowbridge surgery’s alarm goes off very loud day and night for not reason for days now. They don’t seem to do anything even after complaints.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Merriam Avenue, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flypost, 6th September
item.description:
Someone has stuck a large advert for their company on this bus shelter glass section. I noticed the same advert on a few other bus stops but was able to remove them myself. I'm sure other bus stops in the area may have the same advert stuck up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.title: Dumped vehicle. Wickham Lane, outside Plumstead cemetery. Opposite Josephine Court., 6th September
item.description:
Car has been dumped for approx 6-8 weeks. It is being vandalised and the back windscreen is now missing. Becoming increasingly public safety issue as car and buses are having to pull out on curve to avoid and risk hitting oncoming traffic. Vehicle is drawing attention by local vandals and is causing anti social behaviour. Please can you arrange for this dumped vehicle to be removed as a matter of priority. Many thanks!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Wickham Lane, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sanitiser bottle thrown from vehicle in picture at my car and left on the floor., 6th September
item.description:
The lady driving the black car in question threw a bottle of hand sanitiser from her car at my car and left it in the road. I have also reported this criminal damage to the police and they informed me to raise it to the council aswell as it is a littering offence. The crime reference number is - CAD 3766/06 sept 25.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin bags outside 67 Clifton Hill, London NW8 0JN, 6th September
item.description:
6 green bin bags have been left on the street outside 67 Clifton Hill, London NW8 0JN for some time now, and the Council/rubbish trucks haven't removed them. Please can they be collected as soon as possible. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Clifton Hill, Maida Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic Cones, 6th September
item.description:
There are 2 large lone traffic cones sitting on this small traffic island where the traffic lights are. They have been sitting there for many weeks, clearly left behind from previous works. They sometimes end up in the road, which is obviously a hazard. Can they be collected.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croydon Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extensive build up of dead leaves and littering along entire street, 6th September
item.description:
There has been a large build up of dead leaves along the length of Anerley Park Road that need to be swept and cleared. There is also a lot of littering up and down the street, including empty cigarette packs, plastic wrapping and discarded fast food boxes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Anerley Park Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public Litter Bins, 6th September
item.description:
What happened to the public litter bins around the Chinese Roundabout? It appears at least 2 have been removed, why? There really should be a litter bin by the pond, and by North Lodge corner/Wickham Way, if possible. Removal of public litter bins will unfortunately only cause more litter, sad but true.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2a, Stone Park Avenue, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
